content: row 15 size m/l row 29-36 repeat row 15 size xl/2x row 29-40 repeat row 15 size 3x row 29-44 repeat row 15 size 4x row 29-48 repeat row 15 for longer length continue repeat row 15 match the repeats with the back piece last texture repeat row 1 ch3 2 double_crochet *skip 2 double_crochet 5 chain 2 skip 4 3 double_crochet* repeat ** to end of row turn 23 33 33 43 43 53 last texture repeat row 2-5 repeat last texture repeat row 1 last body row ch1 single_crochet in each st and chain finish off 23 33 33 43 43 53 sew front to back along sides leaving 7 7 8 9 9 5 10 inches from the top sew tops together matching stitches from the outside leaving gap in center for neck hole www harbourstitches com | @harbourstitches pattern written xs s/m m/l xl/2x 3x 4x starting chain is counted in st count sleeves attach yarn at side seam underarm worked in turning rounds starting is counted chain 2 work 55 55 59 63 65 67 double_crochet around armhole slip_stitch to first st turn row 1 ch2 double_crochet in each st slip_stitch to first st turn 56 56 60 64 66 68 row 2 ch2 decrease double_crochet in each st to last 2 decrease slip_stitch to first turn 54 54 58 62 64 66 row 3-28 repeat row 1 and 2 28 28 32 36 38 40 row 29-30 ch2 double_crochet in each st slip_stitch to first st turn 28 28 32 36 38 40 row 31 ch2 double_crochet in each st slip_stitch to first st do not finish off 28 28 32 36 38 40 for longer length continue to repeat row 31 cuff chain 6 turn row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in each chain 2 slip_stitch into sleeve bottom double_crochet turn row 2 single_crochet in blo of each single_crochet turn 5 row 3 ch1 single_crochet in blo of each st 2 slip_stitch into sleeve bottom double_crochet turn repeat row 2 and 3 around sleeve bottom finish off leaving long tail for sewing sew first and last row of cuff together bottom ribbing attach to bottom front edge chain 11 turn row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in each chain 2 slip_stitch int bottom edge double_crochet turn row 2 single_crochet in blo of each single_crochet turn 10 row 3 ch1 single_crochet in blo of each st 2 slip_stitch into sweater bottom turn repeat row 2 and 3 around bottom edge work single_crochet evenly up front edge neckhole and down other front edge front edge row ch1 single_crochet in blo of each single_crochet turn repeat front edge row 6 times or until you are happy with front edge thickness finish off www harbourstitches com | @harbourstitches
